channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq fall as Trump amps up tariff threats with deadline looming

item.title: WATCH: How heavy rain caused catastrophic flooding in Texas
item.description: ABC News Chief Meteorologist Ginger Zee shares how the fast flood threat developed so quickly and how early people were warned about the dangers.

item.title: Tesla stock sinks after Elon Musk announces new political party
item.description: Tesla stock price was down after Musk said he's formed the America Party, the latest development in the billionaire's feud with President Trump.

item.title: White House suggests some countries could see tariff deadline shifted
item.description: The chair of the White House Council of Economic Advisers said that some countries that are negotiating with the U.S. could see tariffs delayed.

item.title: Texas flooding victims: From campers to parents, what we know about the lives lost

item.title: Death toll from Texas flash floods rises to at least 82, officials say
item.description: Almost a dozen people from a children's summer camp in Kerr County remain missing, officials said.

item.title: Texas high school says Camp Mystic counselor was among those killed in flooding
item.description: Chloe Childress, a counselor at Camp Mystic, died during the flooding in Hunt, Texas, according to a representative of her high school.

item.title: 3 dead, 10 injured in South Philadelphia shooting; person is in custody, police say
item.description: Authorities say three people were killed and 10 others injured in a shooting
